description: Gino Weinberg is the Knight of Three, a seventeen year-old Knightmare Frame pilot who comes from a noble family. He has lived a rather sheltered life as his family is very wealthy, and as such displays naïveté with how the world really works. To remedy this, he enrolls in Ashford Academy along with Anya Alstreim. He has a very cheerful personality and friendly demeanor. He pilots the transformable Knightmare Frame Tristan.
name: Gino Weinberg
